content: The Act may be cited as the "Making Adoption Affordable Act of 2012" and includes expanded tax benefits for adoption made permanent. The "Making Adoption Affordable Act of 2012" includes permanent expansions for adoption tax benefits. This includes an increase in the dollar limitation for the adoption credit from $10,000 to $13,170.
